turns.content: Please generate a list of the 500 most important french vocabularies and structure them by topic.

Certainly! Here is a list of 500 important French vocabularies categorized by topic:

### Greetings and Basic Expressions

1. Bonjour - Hello
2. Salut - Hi
3. Au revoir - Goodbye
4. À bientôt - See you soon
5. Merci - Thank you
6. De rien - You're welcome
7. Pardon - Excuse me
8. Excusez-moi - Sorry
9. Comment allez-vous ? - How are you?
10. Ça va bien, merci - I'm fine, thank you

### Numbers and Time

1. Un - One
2. Deux - Two
3. Trois - Three
4. Quatre - Four
5. Cinq - Five
6. Six - Six
7. Sept - Seven
8. Huit - Eight
9. Neuf - Nine
10. Dix - Ten
11. Vingt - Twenty
12. Trente - Thirty
13. Quarante - Forty
14. Cinquante - Fifty
15. Soixante - Sixty
16. Soixante-dix - Seventy
17. Quatre-vingts - Eighty
18. Quatre-vingt-dix - Ninety
19. Cent - Hundred
20. Mille - Thousand
21. Midi - Noon
22. Minuit - Midnight
23. Heure - Hour
24. Minute - Minute
25. Seconde - Second

### Colors

1. Rouge - Red
2. Jaune - Yellow
3. Bleu - Blue
4. Vert - Green
5. Orange - Orange
6. Violet - Purple
7. Rose - Pink
8. Blanc - White
9. Noir - Black
10. Gris - Gray

14. Cousin(e) - Cousin
15. Ami(e) - Friend

### Adjectives

26.
